EmailTemplate.name: Industry & Regulatory Updates *2nd Reminder* Crystal City 05/01/08
EmailTemplate.subject: ASA Industry and Regulatory Update – Talk with Paul Combe and Betsy Mayotte!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
There's still time to RSVP to attend ASA’s Industry and Regulatory Update. Come hear Paul Combe talk about the current industry climate and Betsy Mayotte discuss expected regulatory changes.
Date, Time, and Location: Thursday, May 1, 2008 8:30 am – 12:00 pm (Continental breakfast will be provided.) Marriott Courtyard Arlington Crystal City
How to Register - Online at http://www.amsa.com/fap/training - Email your name, institution, and phone number to training@amsa.com - Call ASA's Training Department at (800) 999-9080 ext. 3099
All of ASA's training events are offered free of charge. Training is considered one of the guarantor's core responsibilities and ASA is dedicated to providing informative and useful training events for our industry colleagues.
